We spend the episode discussing how the unique nature of fixed income markets present both opportunities and risks. For example, how the differing breadth and liquidity in corporate credit versus rates markets impacts the types of strategies that can be implemented, or how the assumption about a bond's availability or liquidity can materially impact a portfolio backtest. As head of research, Ralph also has some strong thoughts on the research process itself.
